item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by Christopher Buckley
item.description: "That's the beauty of argument, if you argue correctly, you're never wrong." -- Christopher Buckley

item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by Julie Anne Long
item.description: "A proper kiss, Miss Eversea, should turn you inside out. It should . . . touch places in you that you didn’t know existed, set them ablaze, until your entire being is hungry and wild...It should slice right down through you like a cutlass with a pleasure so devastating it’s very nearly pain … It should make you want to do things you’d never dreamed you’d want to do, and in that moment all of those things will make perfect sense. And it should herald, or at least promise, the most intense physical pleasure you’ve ever known, regardless of whether that promise is ever, ever fulfilled. It should, in fact . . . ” he paused for effect “ . . . haunt you for the rest of your life." -- Julie Anne Long

item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "My dear, I don't give a damn." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by Michael Crichton
item.description: "Do you know what we call opinion in the absence of evidence? We call it prejudice." -- Michael Crichton

item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by William Butler Yeats
item.description: "Had I the heavens' embroidered cloths, Enwrought with golden and silver light, The blue and the dim and the dark cloths Of night and light and the half light, I would spread the cloths under your feet: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams." -- William Butler Yeats

item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by Sarra Manning
item.description: "We're broken. It's like we have all these jagged edges that scare other people off, but when we're with each other, our jagged edges fit together and we're almost whole." -- Sarra Manning

item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "I'd do almost anything for you. I think I'd kill for you. But I'm not going to comfort you while you cry in my arms over another man. - Gage Travis" -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Rie_dominique add a quote by Patrick Ness
item.description:
"Four lines, and the world went quiet.
<i>I'm sorry for telling everyone about your mum</i>, read the first line. <i>I miss being your friend</I>, read the second. <i>Are you okay?</i> read the third. <i><b>I</b> see you</i>, read the fourth, with the <b><i>I</i></b> underlined about a hundred times." -- Patrick Ness
